content.rendered:
Islamabad Exim Bank Job in 2024. Providing financial assistance to exporters and importers, the Export-Import Bank of Pakistan (EXIM Bank) promotes international trade. Various positions within the EXIM Bank are currently open for qualified candidates.

To apply for a position at the EXIM Bank of Pakistan, you must have a bachelor’s degree from a recognized institution. It is preferable to have a Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA), a degree in Commerce, or an accounting degree. Monthly salaries range between 30000 and 45000 rupees.

Islamabad Exim Bank Job in 2024

Date Posted: 10 August, 2024
Last Date: 16 October, 2024
Category: Government
Education: Bachelor, B.com, BBA, ACCA, Others, BS
Location: Islamabad, Pakistan
Organization: Exim Bank of Pakistan
Job Industry: Bank Jobs
Job Type: Full Time

Latest Job In August 2024

  • NASTP Jobs in Islamabad, 2024
  • Job at Peshawar Services Club in August 2024
  • Job At Balochistan Wheels Limited In Karachi In August 2024
  • Vacancies at Rising Star International Technical Training Center Abu Dhabi 2024
  • Qatar 2024 Pakistan International School Advertisement

The Exim Bank of Pakistan, Karachi Islamabad Pakistan, has advertised several Treasury jobs, including head of Treasury and manager of Treasury Settlements. These jobs were advertised in the daily Express Newspaper on 10 August 2024. You can find information on Bachelor, ACCA, Others, B.com, and BBA in this section. There is a requirement for an education qualification for consideration.

Exim Bank of Pakistan jobs and other public sector jobs can be applied for until October 16, 2024, or as specified in the newspaper advertisement. Read the full ad online to find out more about the newest positions at the Exim Bank of Pakistan.

Application Process

Discover how to apply for bank jobs at Exim Bank, from submission requirements to selection procedures. Stand out as a top candidate by showcasing your expertise, experience, and commitment to banking.
